alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 425 PM EDT/325 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Blountstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Telogia, Clarksville, Red Oak, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Hosford, Clio, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Nettle Ridge, Estiffanulga, Woods, Lowry, Blountstown Airport, Hugh Creek and Durham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
